A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. its top management on Thursday, announcing that co-founder Larry Page would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers, broader business relationships( and) government outreach. Eric Schmidt , who has served as Google's CEO for a decade, will also act as an internal adviser to Page and to Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , the Mountain View, California-based company said
